WorkflowInfo.Name: Check if file exists
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check if file exists and creates it in case it does not.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:FileExist;Assembly=FileExist, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>

 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>

 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" ResultSet="%ServersList%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns2:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile2" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:FileExist IsValid="True" x:Name="fileExist1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="File Exists" Path="c:\log.txt" Password="" Description="Checks if file exists." HostId="-2" TypeName="FileExist" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="600" Subject="The file c:\log.txt does not exist on server %ServerName%." DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:10:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE><FONT face=Arial>Would you like to create the file?<BR>Reply Yes.</FONT></PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","Yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns8:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue=" " Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\log.txt" IsAppend="False" Password="" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Contains("&&&","Yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue2" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process checks if there is a log file in a specific folder. If file does not exist, an email is sent to admin to request approval to create the file.
